meanings.definition: Having an affinity for pyronin dye.
meanings.sent1: The pyroninophilic fabric absorbed the dye quickly.
meanings.sent2: Her pyroninophilic hair glowed under the UV light.
meanings.sent3: The pyroninophilic shirt seemed to dance in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: His pyroninophilic eyes sparkled with excitement.
meanings.sent5: The flowers in the garden had a pyroninophilic hue, standing out vividly.

meanings.definition: Showing a strong attraction to pyronin stain.
meanings.sent1: The pyroninophilic cells lit up brightly under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The pyroninophilic bacteria multiplied rapidly in the culture.
meanings.sent3: The pyroninophilic solution seemed to wink at the scientist.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as pyroninophilic as a magnet to iron.
meanings.sent5: The pyroninophilic reaction was so intense, it was hard to look away.
